mapper.select: SELECT count(id) from memberInfo where id=#{value}
SELECT count(memNickName) from memberInfo where memNickName=#{value}
select id from memberInfo where memName=#{name} and memPhone=#{phone}
select * from memberInfo where memName=#{name} and id=#{id} and memPhone=#{phone}
select signdate, comName, memName, id, dept, memPhone, memNickName, admission from memberInfo a right outer join companyInfo b on a.comCode=b.comCode where admission=0 order by signdate
select signdate, comName, memName, id, dept, memPhone, memNickName, admission from memberInfo a right outer join companyInfo b on a.comCode=b.comCode where admission=1 order by signdate
SELECT memNum, memName, id, memNickName, comCode, dept, memPhone, signdate, admission from memberInfo where comCode=#{comCode}
select com.comName from companyInfo com left outer join memberInfo mem on com.comCode = mem.comCode where mem.memNum = #{memNum}
select memName, id from memberInfo where memNum = #{memNum}
